CustomField.description: This field indicates whether the project is overdue based on the current stage and step completion date. If the project is overdue, the field will display 'Overdue'; otherwise, it will remain blank.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(pse__Stage__c, "In-Discussion"), ISPICKVAL(pse__Stage__c, "Start Confirmed"), ISPICKVAL(pse__Stage__c, "In Progress"), ISPICKVAL(pse__Stage__c, "On Hold"), ISPICKVAL(pse__Stage__c, "Deliverables Complete") ), TODAY() > CASE( pse__Stage__c, "In-Discussion", Current_Step_Date__c + 30, "Start Confirmed", Current_Step_Date__c + 30, "In Progress", Current_Step_Date__c + 14, "On Hold", Current_Step_Date__c + 60, "Deliverables Complete", Current_Step_Date__c + 60, Current_Step_Date__c ) ), "Overdue", "" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether the project is overdue based on the current stage and step completion date.
CustomField.label: Overdue Status
